content.question: If all else is constant, which of the following would result in a decrease of the probability of a Type <math alttext="2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mtext>II</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> error?

choices.label: The true parameter is closer to the null.
Type <math alttext="2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>II</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> error cannot be decreased, only increased.

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Make an appropriate claim or draw an appropriate conclusion.
